article: the hong kong special administrative region -lrb- hksar -rrb- government will train local people and attract more foreign talents to the city , said financial secretary antony leung in his ####\/#### budget speech delivered wednesday afternoon .
abstract: hk financial secretary emphasizes development of human resources
